flow.descriptionCdata:
dd4943be-5f3c-4dad-be51-0b04c7abe028.0e3305b1-0066-4c06-aebf-7d3732e36cba.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API.

Inputs\:
_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id
_processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State)



Result\:
_processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State
 dd4943be-5f3c-4dad-be51-0b04c7abe028.6b45fa53-b6e6-4b63-bb5e-a0e8da7a7190.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail dd4943be-5f3c-4dad-be51-0b04c7abe028.6b87ccca-88ac-4370-a2c2-1c268c50bedd.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail dd4943be-5f3c-4dad-be51-0b04c7abe028.83d85879-6c60-4f88-9af9-3d1d316c188b.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs.

result\:
propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated)
e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ dd4943be-5f3c-4dad-be51-0b04c7abe028.9a7864ae-b916-4210-8259-98ec7a62940e.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API.

Inputs\:
_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id
_processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State)



Result\:
_processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State

 dd4943be-5f3c-4dad-be51-0b04c7abe028.f8ddcf5f-5c42-4da0-90f3-557c1a8064ee.description=This flow will format and mount initial and additional datadisks to virtual and physical servers.

The inputs are\:

server.os		Mandatory - should contain 'win' in case of windows, and '2008' or '2012' to make a difference between those two
isAdditional		Mandatory - should be 'True' if the disk that is added is not the first initial datadisk, but an additional one
lun.wwname		Only required for additional Linux datadisks
disk.filesystem	Only required for Linux servers
server.hostname	Madatory
disk.mountpoint	Not used at the moment. Can be used later to specifiy a mountpoint. See memo in the flow.
disk.size		Mandatory for Windows (All servers), and for Linux virtual servers
isVirtual		Mandatory - should be 'True' if the server is a virtual server. False for physical servers
 dd4943be-5f3c-4dad-be51-0b04c7abe028.ff4820f5-8a4d-4457-8912-8cc883103f19.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail
flow.name: pc_lc_add_shared_disk
